# factors-c
Gets all factors of a specified number, including prime factors, using stacks.

## Input #1
```
999
```

## Output #1
```
3 3 3 37
3 3 111
3 9 37
3 333
9 111
27 37

6
```

## Input #2
```
10000
```

## Output #2
